tool.name: GFF3 Add Gene to CDS
tool.description: is one step of fixing a gene model--adding parent gene features to CDSs
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool updates the gene model in a GFF3, useful when a nonstandard gene model has been applied. It finds all CDS features, **strips their parent features**, then applies a gene-mRNA-CDS model, compliant with the standard GFF3 format.
Warning: Use this tool only when it is absolutely necessary to fix a gene model.
